about_the_game:
You play as a young student who is in his final year of university. His life is full of student hangouts, parties and, of course, attention from girls. However, everything changes when he learns that his own sister, whom he hasn't seen for many years, is entering the same university.
When they finally meet, he notices how much she has changed - she has grown up, matured and become incredibly attractive. This causes him to have conflicting feelings, which gradually develop into something much deeper than just familial affection.
This situation leads them both to difficult decisions and unexpected consequences, forcing them to look at their lives and relationships from a new and frightening perspective.

Key Features:

Deep Narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and high quality sex animations.
Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is intended for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains incest. All characters shown in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Incest Story: Sister

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Incest Story: Sister is a visual novel for adult audience. You take on the role of a young guy who studies at a famous university. His sister enters the same university. A forbidden love quickly develops between the characters.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
